title: Mr. Spock and Dr. McCoy
subtitle: The Head and the Heart of the U.S.S. Enterprise
author: Tom W. Hartung
card_content_html:
The logical Mr. Spock's image shows his cool, calm character, and is of course mostly Green.

The emotional Dr. McCoy's warm image is mostly red and stands in stark contrast to Spock's.
